title: Recycling Center vs. Waste Processing Complex : r/CitiesSkylines - Reddit
body: Here are the numbers: Waste Processing Complex: 38.4 waste/money +materials. Incinaration Plant: 39.34 waste/money. Ultimate Recycling Plant: 64.86 waste/money + materials. Recycling Center: 100 waste/money + materials. As you can see, the Was Processing Complex just got decimated, and I haven't even added the cost of maintaining the Waste ...
